name: Project: Sentient
description:
Project: Sentient is a robot platformer game, full of puzzles and advanced tech of the modern era. 

You'll play as Genesis V, a robot prepped for immediate deconstruction by its creator, AI Secured, due to showings of sentient-like behavior. Genesis V has one mission in mind: escape in order to fully experience what it is to be sentient. 

Navigate your way through the AI Secured factory and along the path take control of fellow robots, consisting of various unique abilities in order to surpass hurdles and obstacles the factory has thrown your way. Will you make your way out and reach full sentient status before it's too late? Or will you cease to exist and become metal scraps?
